code: import React from"react";import{BarChart,Bar,XAxis,YAxis,CartesianGrid,Tooltip,ResponsiveContainer}from"recharts";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FunnelChart=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"w-full",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-4",children:"\uC815\uC81C \uB2E8\uACC4\uBCC4 \uD604\uD669"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-full h-72 md:h-96",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveContainer,{width:"100%",height:"100%",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(BarChart,{data:data,layout:"vertical",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartesianGrid,{strokeDasharray:"3 3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{type:"number"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{dataKey:"name",type:"category",width:150}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{formatter:value=>new Intl.NumberFormat("ko-KR").format(value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{dataKey:"count",fill:"#4F46E5",label:{position:"right",formatter:value=>new Intl.NumberFormat("ko-KR").format(value)}})]})})})]});};export default FunnelChart;
